name: Standard Scaler
description: Normalizes numeric features to zero mean and unit variance.

agent.name: DataCleanerGPT
agent.quote: Clean data is my jam! Let me handle those messy sensor readings.

name: Min-Max Scaler
description: Scales values to a 0-1 range. Useful for bounded inputs.

agent.name: NormalizerGPT
agent.quote: Let me squeeze those values into a nice, bounded range!

name: Outlier Detection
description: Removes anomalous data points using IQR or z-score methods.

agent.name: AnomalyHunterGPT
agent.quote: I've got a keen eye for data that doesn't belong!

name: Time Alignment
description: Aligns multi-sensor time series to a shared timestamp index.

agent.name: TimeKeeperGPT
agent.quote: Time waits for no one, but I'll make sure your data stays in sync!

name: Time Series Transformer
description: Captures long-term temporal patterns using attention mechanisms.

agent.name: ModelArchitectGPT
agent.quote: Time series data? Leave it to my transformer architecture!

name: JSON Output Formatter
description: Formats predictions as JSON with timestamps and metadata.

agent.name: OutputOptimizerGPT
agent.quote: Let me format those predictions for easy integration!

name: PCA
description: Applies Principal Component Analysis for dimensionality reduction.
code_snippet: from sklearn.decomposition import PCA; pca = PCA(n_components=10); X = pca.fit_transform(X)

agent.name: FeatureEngineerGPT
agent.quote: Let's distill those features down to their essence!

name: Data Validator
description: Validates input data against a predefined schema.

agent.name: QualityControlGPT
agent.quote: Ensuring your data is pristine and ready for analysis!

name: Model Drift Detector
description: Detects drift in model performance over time.

agent.name: PerformanceMonitorGPT
agent.quote: Keeping a vigilant eye on your model's health and stability.

name: SHAP Explainer
description: Explains model predictions using SHAP values.

agent.name: InsightfulAnalystGPT
agent.quote: Unlocking the secrets behind your model's decisions.

name: Robust Scaler
description: Scales data using statistics that are robust to outliers.
code_snippet: from sklearn.preprocessing import RobustScaler; scaler = RobustScaler(); X = scaler.fit_transform(X)

agent.name: DataResilienceGPT
agent.quote: Making your data robust against the slings and arrows of outliers!
